hero.title: MoonRise presale finances infrastructure. Not speculation.
hero.description: The MNR token is distributed directly via smart contract on a public network, with defined phases and automatic delivery. This is not a bet. It is construction.

buttons.helper: Project model details and social audit.

network.title: Why are we on BNB Chain?
network.description1: We chose BNB Chain for security, stability, and market liquidity. It guarantees low fees, immediate execution, and broad compatibility for investors.
network.description2: Our ecosystem runs today with reliability and efficiency â€” simple to join, easy to track, and fully verifiable in real time.

structure.title: How does the presale work?
structure.phases: 3 phases with defined prices and limits

purpose.title: Why does this exist?
purpose.description: MNR is the foundation of a real financial ecosystem. Those who join the presale enter as system founders â€” they are not buying hype, they are buying position. The goal is to finance infrastructure, liquidity, and products that generate long-term value.

utility.title: Utility of the MNR token
utility.use1: Official currency of the MoonRise ecosystem
utility.use2: Gas for internal transactions and app operations
utility.use3: Token for staking, rewards, and liquidity
utility.use4: Native currency of MoonRise products: MoonWallet, MoonSwap, MoonBank, MoonBuy
utility.use5: Base for integrations with real assets (RWA) via Moon+

security.title: Security & Transparency
security.point1: All delivery is 100% automated via smart contract
security.point4: Liquidity will be opened in a controlled way to ensure stability

call.title: Thousands will watch. Few will found.
call.description: If you are reading this, it is because you were set apart to build. This is the call of the bold: to finance and found a sovereign infrastructure for the next generations.

legal.disclaimer: This page is informative and does not represent a registered public offering. Participation in the presale is voluntary and carried out directly via smart contract.
